definition: fan who only likes one particular member of a pop idol band
fan who only likes one particular member of a pop idol band
fan of one particular member of a pop idol band who denigrates and defames the other members
one of the two chief types of music in Chinese opera/see also 二黃|二黄[er4 huang2]
(slang) (lit.) to tear cunt/(fig.) (of females) to have a catfight/to have a bitch fight
(neologism) person who posts online in support of the Chinese government, but unlike a wumao 五毛[wu3 mao2], is not paid for doing so (abbr. for 自帶乾糧的五毛|自带干粮的五毛[zi4 dai4 gan1 liang2 de5 wu3 mao2])
(female usage) older brother (loanword from Korean "oppa")/male friend
before daybreak/dawn about to break/(used in given names)
(originally) to provide assistance/(more recently) to show one's support (for a singing idol etc)
